content: jimjam the fighting victorious hooker hat here it is - a project composed of love hope and some fancy stitches writing a freeform pattern in a way that almost everyone can follow was quite a challenge and our haaksteek sisters who contributed to this project truly deserve a medal it was such a huge task for such a small hat i just wrote to one of the sisters from our haaksteek team telling her that next time i come up with something crazy like this she should stop me because it wasn t worth all the hard work she replied it was worth it because it came from your heart … so sweet initially the hat was designed for mirjam especially but over time it has become a symbol of hope love and comfort for cancer patients and anyone who is in need of a warm hug by purchasing a crochet kit from doris van der waals from haakhuis nl or by simply making a donation you can offer support to miranda zechner-deens from hartenkussen nl the whole story behind this the jimjam pattern and all further information like the how-to of sewing and adding the lining are available in five languages english us terms english uk terms dutch german and spanish at https //haaksteek nl/en/patterns/jimjam/pattern-files/ of course on the website you ll also find a link to the video playlist for jimjam yes tania leis needed no less than three videos to show everything
